title: Abicus - Scientific Calculator Online
description: Free online scientific calculator based on the Finnish Abicus calculator. Perfect for mathematical calculations, homework, and educational purposes.
keywords: abicus, calculator, scientific calculator, online calculator, math calculator, Finnish calculator, educational calculator

hero.title: Abicus Scientific Calculator
hero.subtitle: Experience the precision of the Finnish educational system's official scientific calculator. Designed for foundational mathematical learning without symbolic computation.

whatIs.title: What is Abicus?
whatIs.description: Abicus is a purpose-built scientific calculator developed by the Finnish Matriculation Examination Board for digital assessments. It represents a sophisticated approach to educational technology that prioritizes pedagogical goals over feature complexity.

finnish.title: Finnish Educational Excellence
finnish.description: Born from Finland's world-renowned education system, Abicus embodies the principle that effective tools are defined not by extensive features, but by purposeful limitations that enhance learning.
finnish.feature1: Developed by Finnish Matriculation Examination Board
finnish.feature2: Used in official Finnish digital examinations

scientific.name: Scientific Functions
scientific.desc: Essential mathematical operations without symbolic computation

focused.name: Pedagogically Focused
focused.desc: Designed to assess understanding, not replace thinking

equitable.name: Universal Access
equitable.desc: Same tool for every student, ensuring fairness

features.title: Calculator Features
features.subtitle: Essential scientific functions designed for educational purposes

scientific.title: Scientific Functions
scientific.description: Complete set of essential mathematical operations for educational use.

keyboard.title: Keyboard Support
keyboard.description: Full keyboard integration for efficient mathematical input.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Optimized experience across all devices and screen sizes.

calculator.title: Try the Calculator
calculator.description: Experience the official Abicus calculator directly in your browser. This is the same calculator used in Finnish educational assessments.

howTo.title: How to Use Abicus
howTo.subtitle: Get started with the Abicus calculator in four simple steps

step1.title: Input Numbers
step1.description: Click number buttons or use your keyboard to enter values

step2.title: Select Operation
step2.description: Choose from basic arithmetic or scientific functions

step3.title: Calculate Result
step3.description: Press equals (=) or Enter key to see the result

step4.title: Continue Computing
step4.description: Use the result for further calculations or start fresh

why.title: Why Choose Abicus?
why.subtitle: Understanding the philosophy behind purposeful educational technology

educational.title: Educational Excellence
educational.description: Designed by education experts to promote deep mathematical understanding rather than computational dependence.

fair.title: Equitable Assessment
fair.description: Ensures all students have access to the same tools, eliminating advantages based on expensive hardware.

reliable.title: Proven Reliability
reliable.description: Battle-tested in high-stakes national examinations, trusted by thousands of Finnish students.

quote.title: Educational Philosophy
quote.text: Sometimes the most effective tool is not the one with the most features, but the one with the most precisely defined purpose.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about the Abicus calculator

q1.question: What makes Abicus different from other calculators?
q1.answer: Abicus is specifically designed without symbolic computation capabilities, focusing on numerical calculations to promote understanding of mathematical procedures rather than automated problem-solving.

q2.question: Can I use Abicus for complex mathematical operations?
q2.answer: Abicus supports essential scientific functions including trigonometry, logarithms, and basic arithmetic. It does not perform symbolic algebra or calculus, which is intentional for educational purposes.

q3.question: Is Abicus free to use?
q3.answer: Yes, Abicus is completely free to use. It's an open-source project developed by the Finnish Matriculation Examination Board for educational purposes.

q4.question: Does Abicus work on mobile devices?
q4.answer: Yes, Abicus is fully responsive and works on all modern devices including smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers.

q5.question: Can I use keyboard shortcuts with Abicus?
q5.answer: Yes, Abicus supports full keyboard input including number keys, operators, Enter for calculation, and Escape for clearing.

about.title: About Abicus
about.description: Abicus is inspired by the Finnish digital examination system, providing a scientific calculator focused on essential mathematical functions for educational purposes.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.intro: Abicus is designed to be intuitive and easy to use. Here's how to get started:
gettingStarted.step1: Enter numbers using the on-screen buttons or your keyboard
gettingStarted.step2: Select mathematical operations (+, -, ×, ÷) or scientific functions
gettingStarted.step3: Press the equals button (=) or Enter key to calculate
gettingStarted.step4: Use the result for further calculations or clear to start fresh

tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.tip1: Use keyboard shortcuts for faster input
tips.tip2: Trigonometric functions work in degrees by default
tips.tip3: Press AC to clear all calculations
tips.tip4: The calculator maintains precision for complex calculations

about.title: About Abicus
about.description1: Abicus is a scientific calculator developed by the Finnish Matriculation Examination Board for use in digital assessments.
about.description2: Unlike commercial calculators, Abicus is designed with deliberate limitations to promote understanding of fundamental mathematical procedures.
about.description3: This approach ensures that students demonstrate their knowledge of mathematical concepts rather than relying on automated symbolic computation.

overview.description: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect information when you use the Abicus calculator website.
